roleset.name: (cause) to be similar, comply
roleset.note: CONFORM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'conform' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'follow'. (from conform.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` This conforms to the ` soft landing ' scenario , '' said [*T*-1] Elliott Platt , an economist at Donaldson , Lufkin& Jenrette Securities Corp .

example.name: with temporal adverbial
example.text: Americans-1 are expected [*-1] to conform to the Japanese culture when [*-3]in Japan [*T*-2] .

example.name: conform with
example.text: Responses-1 were weighted [*-1] on the basis of age and gender [*-1]to conform with U.S. Census data .

example.name: with agent
example.text: The Committee on Federal Regulation of Securities for the American Bar Association argues, for example, in its lengthy letter to the SEC, that [the proposed changes]-1 ``would substantially improve the [law]by [*-1] conforming it more closely to contemporary business realities.''
